name: Ext.ux.rating.Picker
doc:
A ratings picker based on Ext.Gadget.

Ext.create({
     xtype: 'rating',
     renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
     listeners: {
         change: function (picker, value) {
            console.log('Rating ' + value);
         }
     }
 });

members.name: animate
members.doc: Specifies an animation to use when changing the value. When setting this config, it is probably best to set trackOver to false.
members.short_doc: Specifies an animation to use when changing the value. ...

members.name: family
members.doc: The CSS font-family to use for displaying the glyphs.
members.short_doc: The CSS font-family to use for displaying the glyphs. ...

members.name: glyphs
members.doc:
Either a string containing the two glyph characters, or an array of two strings containing the individual glyph characters or an array of two numbers with the character codes for the individual glyphs.

For example:

Ext.create({
     xtype: 'rating',
     renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
     glyphs: [ 9671, 9670 ], // '◇◆',
     listeners: {
         change: function (picker, value) {
            console.log('Rating ' + value);
         }
     }
 });
members.short_doc:
Either a string containing the two glyph characters, or an array of two strings
containing the individual glyph chara...

members.name: overStyle
members.doc: Optional styles to apply to the rating glyphs when trackOver is enabled.

members.name: rounding
members.doc: The rounding to apply to values. Common choices are 0.5 (for half-steps) or 0.25 (for quarter steps).
members.short_doc: The rounding to apply to values. ...

members.name: scale
members.doc: The CSS font-size to apply to the glyphs. This value defaults to 125% because glyphs in the stock font tend to be too small. When using specially designed "icon fonts" you may want to set this to 100%.
members.short_doc: The CSS font-size to apply to the glyphs. ...

members.name: selectedStyle
members.doc: Optional styles to apply to the rating value glyphs.

members.name: tip
members.doc:
A template or a function that produces the tooltip text. The Object, String and String[] forms are converted to an Ext.XTemplate. If a function is given, it will be called with an object parameter and should return the tooltip text. The object contains these properties:

  • component: The rating component requesting the tooltip.
  • tracking: The current value under the mouse cursor.
  • trackOver: The value of the trackOver config.
  • value: The current value.

Templates can use these properties to generate the proper text.
members.short_doc: A template or a function that produces the tooltip text. ...

members.name: tooltipText
members.doc: The current tooltip text. This value is set into the DOM by the updater (hence only when it changes). This is intended for use by the tip manager (Ext.tip.QuickTipManager). Developers should never need to set this config since it is handled by virtue of setting other configs (such as the tooltip or the value.).

members.name: trackOver
members.doc: Determines if mouse movements should temporarily update the displayed value. The actual value is only updated on click but this rather acts as the "preview" of the value prior to click.
members.short_doc: Determines if mouse movements should temporarily update the displayed value. ...

members.name: trackingValue
members.doc: This config is used to when trackOver is true and represents the tracked value. This config is maintained by our mousemove handler. This should not need to be set directly by user code.
members.short_doc:
This config is used to when trackOver is true and represents the tracked
value. ...

members.name: value
members.doc: The rating value. This value is bounded by minimum and limit and is also adjusted by the rounding.

members.name: defaultBindProperty
members.doc: Tell the Binding system to default to our "value" config.
members.short_doc: Tell the Binding system to default to our "value" config. ...

members.name: element
members.doc: This object describes our element tree from the root.
members.default: {cls: 'u' + Ext.baseCSSPrefix + 'rating-picker', reference: 'element', children: [{reference: 'innerEl', cls: 'u' + Ext.baseCSSPrefix + 'rating-picker-inner', listeners: {click: 'onClick', mousemove: 'onMouseMove', mouseenter: 'onMouseEnter', mouseleave: 'onMouseLeave'}, children: [{reference: 'valueEl', cls: 'u' + Ext.baseCSSPrefix + 'rating-picker-value'}, {reference: 'trackerEl', cls: 'u' + Ext.baseCSSPrefix + 'rating-picker-tracker'}]}]}
members.short_doc: This object describes our element tree from the root. ...

members.name: twoWayBindable
members.doc: Enable two-way data binding for the "value" config.
members.short_doc: Enable two-way data binding for the "value" config. ...

members.name: afterCachedConfig
members.doc:
Config System Optimizations

These are to deal with configs that combine to determine what should be rendered in the DOM. For example, "glyphs" and "limit" must both be known to render the proper text nodes. The "tip" and "value" likewise are used to update the tooltipText.

To avoid multiple updates to the DOM (one for each config), we simply mark the rendering as invalid and post-process these flags on the tail of any bulk updates.
members.short_doc:
Config System Optimizations

members.name: getGlyphTextNode
members.doc: This method returns the DOM text node into which glyphs are placed.

params.name: dom
params.doc: The DOM node parent of the text node.

members.short_doc: This method returns the DOM text node into which glyphs are placed. ...

members.name: refresh
members.doc: Forcibly refreshes both glyph and tooltip rendering.
members.short_doc: Forcibly refreshes both glyph and tooltip rendering. ...

members.name: refreshGlyphs
members.doc: Refreshes the glyph text rendering unless we are currently performing a bulk config change (initConfig or setConfig).

params.name: now
params.doc: Pass true to force the refresh to happen now.

members.short_doc:
Refreshes the glyph text rendering unless we are currently performing a
bulk config change (initConfig or setConfig). ...

members.name: refreshTip
members.doc: Refreshes the tooltip text rendering unless we are currently performing a bulk config change (initConfig or setConfig).

params.name: now
params.doc: Pass true to force the refresh to happen now.

members.short_doc:
Refreshes the tooltip text rendering unless we are currently performing a
bulk config change (initConfig or setConfig). ...

members.name: valueFromEvent
members.doc: Convert the coordinates of the given Event into a rating value.

return.name: return
return.doc: The rating based on the given event coordinates.

members.short_doc: Convert the coordinates of the given Event into a rating value. ...

members.name: valueToPercent
members.doc: Convert the given rating into a width percentage.

return.name: return
return.doc: The width percentage to represent the given value.

members.short_doc: Convert the given rating into a width percentage. ...

short_doc: A ratings picker based on Ext.Gadget. ...
